channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: AutoM - FATALITY; INC#1338; 05:49PM; 900 S Western Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3QKkJcn; San Pedro; Automobile versus motorcyclist. Sadly the motorcyclist (age/gender unknown) was beyond medical help and determined dead on scene. There are no other injuries reported. All questions are referred to LAPD Inc#3026 for the investigation. No further details. ; FS 101; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; E101 RA101; CH4; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Brush Fire; INC#0898; 02:02PM; 1639 N Laurel Canyon Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/44TWAE9; Hollywood Hills West; KNOCKDOWN: Over 90 firefighters extinguished the fire in just under one hour with no injuries reported. The four homes which were threatened were successfully defended thanks to proper brush clearance which provided the defensible space the firefighters needed. Traffic on Laurel Canyon Blvd will remain impacted as the mop up operations continue through the afternoon. Drivers are highly advised to seek alternate routes. No further details.; FS 41; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; AO1 AO2 BC11 BC18 BC5 CE59 CM20 CM22 E108 E11 E227 E261 E290 E41 E52 E58 E61 E71 E76 E82 E89 E90 E94 E97 EA1 EM14 H1 H2 H3 H7 HA1 HA2 HA3 HA7 HT3 RA27 RA90 RA97 T27 T61 T90; CH5; 12; Margaret Stewart

Update Brush Fire; INC#0898; 01:28PM; 1639 N Laurel Canyon Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/44TWAE9; Hollywood Hills West; There are currently four homes threatened but due to the proper brush clearance in place, they have good defensible space and firefighters are able to get water on the fire while defending the homes. Additional crews are working to gain access to the seat of the fire and deploy progressive hose lays to encircle the fire. There are no evacuation orders in place. Additional resources from both Beverly Hills FD and LA County FD are on scene assisting. ; FS 41; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; AO1 AO2 BC11 BC18 BC5 CM20 CM22 E227 E261 E290 E41 E52 E58 E61 E76 E82 E97 EM14 H1 H2 H3 H7 HA1 HA2 HA3 HA7 HT3 RA90 T27 T61 T90; CH5; 12; Margaret Stewart

Brush Fire; INC#0898; 01:04PM; 1639 N Laurel Canyon Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/44TWAE9; Hollywood Hills West; Preliminary reports of approximately 1 acre of moderate to heavy fuels burning slowly uphill under no wind with *possible* homes threatened (firefighters are moving to that area to investigate if there are exposures). There are no evacuations at this time. Additional resources are enroute.; FS 41; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; AO1 AO2 BC11 BC18 BC5 CM20 CM22 E227 E261 E290 E41 E52 E58 E61 E76 E82 E97 EM14 H1 H2 H7 HA1 HA2 HA7 RA90 T27 T61 T90; CH5; 12; Margaret Stewart

Update Confined Space Rescue; INC#0547; 12:00PM; 317 N Av 19; MAP: https://bit.ly/47n6boA; Lincoln Heights; After a thorough investigation, firefighters determined they did not need to enter the confined space and continued focus on high flow water with foam and have extinguished the fire. No confined space entry was made and no injuries reported. No further details.; FS 1; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC2 E1 E201 E203 E3 HR3 RA3 RA803 T1 T3 UR3; CH7; 12 13; Margaret Stewart

title.a: FORWARD PROGRESS STOPPED Brush Fire 08/05/2023 INC#0662

item.description: FORWARD PROGRESS STOPPED Brush Fire; INC#0662; 12:03PM; 3905 N Lake Vista Ct; MAP: https://bit.ly/43StQKF; Encino; Forward Progress Stopped: No structures damaged, no injuries reported. This will be an extended mop up operations (LA County Fire Dept hand crews on scene assisting) due to the remote terrain and difficulty accessing by foot. No further details.; FS 93; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; AO1 BC10 BC15 BC17 CE59 CM40 CM42 E109 E288 E290 E293 E73 E83 E84 E86 E88 E99 EM17 H1 H2 H3 H4 HA1 HA2 HA3 HA4 HU59 RA83 RA84 T88 T90 T93 WT88; CH8; 17 18; Margaret Stewart

Confined Space Rescue; INC#0547; 11:18AM; 317 N Av 19; MAP: https://bit.ly/47n6boA; Lincoln Heights; Originally dispatched as a rubbish fire (at 9:30AM), this was upgraded to a confined space response. There is a rubbish fire down in an access hole alongside railroad track which has not be extinguished with the water already applied. Making entry to investigate and extinguish requires the confined space protocol for safety reasons. No injuries reported. ; FS 1; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC2 E1 E201 E203 E3 HR3 RA3 RA803 T1 T3 UR3; CH7; 12 13; Margaret Stewart

Update Brush Fire; INC#0662; 11:14AM; 3905 N Lake Vista Ct; MAP: https://bit.ly/43StQKF; Encino; The fire is less than 1/2 acre and is located in remote terrain inaccessible by apparatus. Firefighters are hiking in with hose packs to reach the fire. There are no structures threatened. ; FS 93; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; AO1 BC10 BC15 BC17 CE59 CM40 CM42 E109 E288 E290 E293 E73 E83 E84 E86 E88 EM17 H1 H2 H3 H4 HA1 HA2 HA3 HA4 HU59 RA83 RA84 T88 T90 T93 WT88; CH5; 17; Margaret Stewart

Brush Fire; INC#0662; 10:41AM; 3905 N Lake Vista Ct; MAP: https://bit.ly/43StQKF; Encino; Preliminary reports (limited visual) of approximately 1/4 acre of medium to heavy brush, slow moving and no structures threatened at this time. Additional resources added.; FS 93; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC10 BC15 BC17 CM40 CM42 E109 E288 E290 E293 E73 E83 E84 E86 E88 EM17 H1 H2 H4 HA1 HA2 HA4 RA84 T88 T90 T93 WT88; CH5; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0094; 01:54AM; 436 S Boyle Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3IrVZ3n; Boyle Heights; KNOCKDOWN: The first 38 firefighters on scene extinguished the fire in 27 minutes with no injuries reported. Updated size up: two story craftsman and a detached garage behind it were a previous burn, fully involved and it extended to an additional detached garage to the rear. No further details. ; FS 2; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC14 BC2 CM20 CM22 E1 E17 E2 E202 E203 E209 E210 E211 E25 E289 E89 E9 EM1 EM11 HR3 RA2 SQ21 T10 T11 T2 T3 T89 T9 UR88 UR89; CH9; 12 13; Margaret Stewart
